subnotes.content: This section is arranged alphabetically by the last name of the grant recipient.

This subseries includes files for the 113 scholars awarded grants to pursue basic biomedical research. Scholars' grants were awarded to individuals at the initial stages of their pursuit of study in postgraduate biomedical research. Each grant file is titled with the grantee's name followed by the grant number which indicates the year in which the grant began. The inclusive dates note the chronology of the reports and correspondence. Each file includes: scholar's transmittal sheet; statement of research goals; letters of recommendation from faculty sponsor, department chairperson or institutional officer, director of PhD training program or residency program director; and other letters of endorsement from colleagues and mentors.

Each grant file includes a checklist of documents required to complete the application packet. In cases where there are several grant numbers for one individual, the application is located in the first file. Each file is subdivided as follows: Application; Award, Fund and Term Letters; Grant Data, including financial information; and Reports and Correspondence, which includes annual research reports submitted by the grantee and other correspondence pertaining to the status of the research project funded.
